biotools.summary: The bardensr (barcode dexmixing through non-negative spatial regression) package is a collection of tools for modeling linearly multiplexed observations. There is some true signal we are interested in, but our observations are some noisy linear mixture of those signals.

bioschemas.name: BarDensr
bioschemas.summary: The bardensr (barcode dexmixing through non-negative spatial regression) package is a collection of tools for modeling linearly multiplexed observations. There is some true signal we are interested in, but our observations are some noisy linear mixture of those signals.
